alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 7:34PM PDT until March 28 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PDT MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM PDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 7 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
